entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
